Description: Fragment of oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine light brown. Unusual striations on surface. Rectangular stamp with Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary 1884-5 (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 80, 12 or 28, 2. Name Thales? From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0365.38.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1207)
